reviews.review: If you want some advice on how to make your game even more broken and shitty, just ask BHVR. It's pretty much their hobby.

The game is so good, i don't have problems to play...
Fed up with this game already, way too in the killers advantage. Most maps don't have the ability to hide well near any of the objectives.

It's not bad. Essentially it's a giant game of tag with skill checks. In the beginning the horror is felt and there are rushes when you start to hear the killer get into range. That fades and eventually turns into a grind for everyone for better gear and perks. new killers are sold pretty frequently and at a decent pricepoint, buying all of them in one go adds up quickly though.

I think if any element of the game sounds interesting then feel free to give it a shot.
el juego es disfrutable al inicio pero despues en rangos altos tienes que jugar rata como asesino para ganar si no te hacen los 5 generadores en 2 minutos pero esta divertido

Orient√© soit survivant  soit tueur( bon ... au moins un patch sur deux tu t'amuse suivant ton r√¥le ) mais juste parcequ'un dev ( qui ne sait pas jouer hein il est juste dev) ce fait pisser dessus par des survivants (qui eux savent jouer rappelons le ) le jeux est devenu INJOUABLE avec des buffs tueur toujours plus insanes !

Le systeme de ranking ne veux plus rien dire , je suis monter rang 1 ( je ne pense pas en avoir le niveau ).

This game is an absolute blast to play, with or without friends (altho I suggest playing with friends, if possible), and the game has a ton of stuff to do like get better perks, prestige, etc. The game isn't too overpowered to the killer or the survivors, and playing with both sides is a ton of fun. This game has content for hours and hours on.

It is a great game with an interesting gameplay mechanic, and they keep adding new things to the game, sure there are some inprovements that can be made, but other than that, these people are doing a pretty good job so far.
Its a pretty fun game on both sides. That being said ignore the toxic people as there are many of them.

100% recommend this game. It's really fun, especially with friends, you can have really fun times! This game takes a bit to get started as you need to get used to killer powers, add-ons, loops, etc. But once you get the hang of it, it's really worth. However there are a few bad things about this game, as of right now queue times aren't consistent, you'll have sometimes long and other times short waits, dedicated servers are not the best, and if you're not really good at the game many people might be toxic towards you, but there are a lot of great people in the community, ignore the toxic ones and find the good ones. Even with all of that, the game is a definite grab. Never got more hooked into any other game that I've played.

The game in general is  fun till you play vs those OP monster that people can buy.

Unless they fix  the monsters or  find a way to balance them dont bother playing

probably one if not the best multiplayer horror game ive played in a wile its had a ton of other good game take inspiriastion to which can always be great

Edit: not as good to me as I used to think I only play it when me and a friend have nothing else to do it‚Äôs not even scary and campers are annoying but it‚Äôs still a good game

Do you love being dicked over by people who have been playing the game for the last 2 years? Do you love a toxic community both killers and survivors? Do you love busted game mechanics with terrible balancing and horrendous decisions by a game developer that clearly doesn't play their own game?

Then this tripe is the game for you.
fix the new chapter, its a complete mess

Unbalanced game but playable. Recommend getting it. You will see the unbalance if you really play it daily and be compeitive. but as long as you play it casually its a good game. Had no problems until now

 NAO COMPRE!

awesome horror game,,with lots of horror characters and survivor characters to pick and lots of maps to play and you got to prestige the characters to get good add ons and perks each survivor and killers have different abilities and perks,,its fun game there are very strong perks you can use to make your killer really strong to win the game against survivors,,survivors have got really strong perks you can use against killers to counter attack tunnelling and camping makes the game easier to win,there are alot of survivor players who complain about certain perks killers use,,but survivors have strong perks they can use aswell,,there are loads of maps with certain areas that survivors can be very strong against killer,,there are certain areas on map where killers are stronger than survivors,,most of the players gen rush has fast has they can to win the game but sometimes it can be boring if the killer is not good,,makes the game end to quick,,if you play killer and you get gen rushed alot i would recommend you use mori because it makes it easier to get survivors out of the game really quick to counter attack gen rush,,there are loads of cosmetic for the characters to make your killer and survivor characters to look really cool makes the game more fun and the game does take really long time to prestige your characters which is really good because you have to play the game alot and there are always new characters that are brought into the game and you got prestige the character again.

Salve, questo gioco come gamplay non √® male, i killer e i sopravvissuti sono sbloccabili tramite acquisti, cellule auriche (devi acquistare anche quelle, ma solo il maiale e freddy si sbloccano solo con questo mezzo) o con 9000 punti sangue che si ottengono giocando.L'ultimo evento di halloween √® stato a dir poco pessimo, in tutte le partite si perdeva perch√® gli altri sopravvissuti passavano il tempo a estrarre il nettare dalla pianta demoniaca per sbloccare i nuovi "look horror " dei mostri e i nuovi look stile ottocento dei sopravvissuti, per questo in quel periodo ho giocato solo killer.Recentemente ho un problema col gioco che quando cerco una partita capita che si impalla il caricamento e non puoi neanche uscire dal gioco cliccando alt+F4 bug inaccettabile per un gioco come questo, un altro bug che ho avuto in passato riguardava i salvataggi, dopo le partite non me li salvava ed ho scritto all' assistenza, per fortuna quel problema √® stato risolto. Per finire gli sviluppatori dovrebbero inserire un sistema per chiudere la botola, perch√® in molte partite restano solo il killer e il sopr. che stanno due ore a fissarsi finch√® uno non cede, per quanto riguarda i sopravvissuti dovete fare in modo che una volta sabotato l' uncino, esso non riappaia, come succedeva prima, perch√® competenze come agitazione, morsa di ferro, l' impiccato(che fa riapparire i ganci dopo 30 secondi ) e sabotatore per i sopravvissuti, vengono depotenziati e resi inutili.
 per sabotatore potete fare che saboti un numero massimo di ganci a partita.
Sviluppatori perfavore cercate di migliorare questo gioco.

Playing this game for a while now and exept some rude Users I don't have much too complain. I love the funny bugs that happen sometime. Would recomend getting it for you and your friends

Ho questo gioco praticamente da quando √® uscito. L'ho ricomprato su questo account (motivi miei) e vi posso dire che nel tempo √® peggiorato in tutto e ora fa proprio schifo. Con gli ultimi aggiornamenti hanno ulteriormente potenziato il killer per colpa di tutti i nabbi che si lamentavano andando a piangere nell'hub della comunit√† e quindi col survivor √® diventato complicato. Metti caso allora che vuoi divertirti a fare kill facili col killer NON PUOI perch√® appena crei la lobby DEVI INVECCHIARE prima che i survivor entrino in partita (sono rango 5 sia col survivor che col killer). Quindi che dire non ve lo consiglio assolutamente.
very very fun and a great way to ineract with other gamers in learning team play
